thread.title: Great location, great hotel
thread.title_full: Great location, great hotel - Review of Grange Rochester Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: curlykate1976
title: Great location, great hotel
text: We chose the Grange Rochester for price and Location. Great find and really good price. Nice welcome with friendly receptionist we received an upgrade which was nice, good room with 2 double beds! Yes hotel is a bit tired, but it's clean and friendly in a great location for exploring the city, friendly staff. Comfy bed. would definitely stay again.
